definition: Hankou, part of Wuhan 武漢|武汉 at the junction of Han river and Changjiang in Hubei
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
man
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: we can offer: Website translation service, language interpretation service, editing service, proofread-ing service and more
sentences.chinese: 相關的俄文或英文文件翻譯及俄漢口譯工作。

sentences.english: They retired in the direction of Hankow.
Hanzhengjie is the birthplace of Hankou, it is also one of the culture cradle of Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 漢正街是漢口的發源地，也是武漢市文化的搖籃之一。

sentences.english: The residents of the Hankou Binjiang estate had been moved out weeks before.
sentences.chinese: 漢口濱江的居民數週前就已將財產轉移。

sentences.english: I took a wooden boat from Chongqing to Hankou.
sentences.chinese: 從重慶到漢口，我坐了木船。

sentences.english: Hanzheng Street is one of the oldest streets in Wuhan, and there are hundreds of streets besides it.
sentences.chinese: 漢正街爲漢口最古老之街道，兩邊大小巷道均以百計。

sentences.english: Before opening the port, HanKow was already a prosperous town.
sentences.chinese: 開埠之前，漢口已是一個繁華的商業市鎮。

sentences.english: Dad persuaded the captain of a pien-tzu to take them down the Han River to Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸說服一條“扁舟”的船老大帶他們順漢江去漢口。

sentences.english: He has been transferred from Nanchang to Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 他已從南昌被調至漢口。

sentences.english: From Hong Shan's Chen Jiawan, 27 when move Chinese mouth, arrive again iron machine village.
sentences.chinese: 從洪山的陳家灣，搬到漢口的二七路，再到鐵機村。

sentences.english: Hankow was a new commercial town in mid-late Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 漢口是明朝中後期開始興起的一個新興的商業城鎮。

sentences.english: The tunnel cuts travel time to 7 minutes from half an hour between the city's major areas - Wuchang and Hankou.
sentences.chinese: 開通後，武昌至漢口的車程從半小時縮短到7分鐘。

sentences.english: Pai maneuvered himself into a strategic position in Central China and became commander of the government's defense at Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 白崇禧設法混到漢口擔任華中剿匪總司令的要職。

sentences.english: The Yangtze River separates Hankou and Wuchang.
sentences.chinese: 長江把漢口和武昌分隔開來。

sentences.english: On my way to Beijing I plan to stop over for a few days in Hankou.
sentences.chinese: 我在去北京時，打算在中途在漢口逗留幾天。

definition: Wuhan city on Changjiang, subprovincial city and capital of Hubei province
Changsha prefecture-level city and capital of Hunan province in south central China
Hanyang county in Hubei province/historical name Hanyang for Seoul, Korea
Guiyang prefecture-level city and capital of Guizhou province 貴州|贵州[Gui4 zhou1], short name 筑[Zhu4]
Chongqing city (Chungking), formerly in Sichuan province, a municipality since 1997, short name 渝[Yu2]
over there/yonder
river bank
this side/here
there
the Shanghai Bund or Waitan
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
post office/CL:家[jia1],個|个[ge4]
Donghu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
Nanning prefecture level city and capital of Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region in south China 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区
Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
abbr. of 同濟大學|同济大学[Tong2 ji4 Da4 xue2]
